WorkPlace.Description: HR Relationer har mange års erfaring med at skabe det perfekte match mellem virksomheder og kandidater. For dig som erhvervsdrivende er det vigtigt at have fokus på dine kerneområder, dette får du ved at lade os håndterer dele af eller hele rekrutteringsprocessen.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Experienced machine operator for excavator/backhoes, dump truck etc. wanted for Horsens, Vejle and Kolding
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have experience as a machine operator? - Please read here!

WANTED:
2 Operator for sewer excavation that can work independently and has lots of good energy.

The tasks are in the "triangle area": Horsens - Vejle - Kolding

 

Who are you:

  • You have at least a couple of years of experience as a machine operator with driving excavators/backhoes, dump trucks etc.
  • You speak and understand english
  • You are a team player
  • You have a positive nature
  • You are reliable and flexible in relation to working hours and places ("Triangle area")
  • You are careful and understand the importance of good craftsmanship
  • You are responsibility conscious
  • You have a driving license B

 

You are offered:

  • An attractive and independent job
  • Good and committed colleagues and leaders
  • Versatile work tasks
  • Good work environment
  • Good salary according to qualifications

Our customer has many years of experience in the industry and performs many types of contractor tasks for public, private and business customers. All done in the highest quality with a focus on good, honest and professional service.

Good communication, overview and quality assurance are key words for the companies. The construction tasks are solved professionally and correctly, schedules are adhered to.

Accession as soon as possible.

Job interviews are held on an ongoing basis - so not hesitate to contact Jaspir!

Further information can be obtained: Call Jaspir: +45 52111440

#JobsForUkraine
